title: Sleepwalking
description: First came the night.Then came the lullaby.Now Mariah Nowak must enlist the aid of young Marcos Walker, caretaker to a small town in southwestern Nevada, if John is to survive the fevered ruin of his dreams.But they aren’t alone in this dark new world.And the sleeping don’t rest easily.Sleepwalking is the third volume of the Nightmareland Chronicles, an ongoing serialized adventure horror epic following one man's journey to reach his estranged daughter in a world claimed by eternal night.
author: Daniel   Barnett
